page.title: 06HINXHILL ESTATE FARM 5
page.content: At the farm there are many essential machines such as combine harvesters, potato elevators, muck spreaders and tractors.On each man driven machine a two wave radio enables communication thrughout the farm.8 years ago there were 3 dairies but now there is only 1. There are bull pens but the govern- ment have cut down on the size of the original herd.A profit must be made from the produce of the farm to buy the equipment needed, as well as to make the work economical.The average price of a combine harvester is between 20,000 and 60,000 pounds this is only 1 example of expense. There is 1 farm manager,1 mechanical fitter,6 arable workers,1 stock worker,1 maintainance worker, a secretary and a gamekeeper. Hinxhill Estate Farm is run efficiently and sets a high standard.
